name: ssg_micro

scripts.test: node test/test_config_normalize.js && node test/test_feedback.js && node test/test_feedback_unit.js && node test/test_runner_multiline_stdin.js && npx playwright test --reporter=line

description: A modern, browser-based Python interpreter powered by MicroPython WebAssembly with advanced features for interactive coding, file management, and execution control.
